title: El Barrio
creator_credit: Norton Heilig, David Sureck and UNICEF
brief_description: Mario Mendoza, age 7, lives in a city dump in Mexico City. We see a day in Mario’s life. The Mexican Government, with aid from UNICEF, plans to help people-like Mario-who are living in such squalid conditions
